thread.title: IFA 2015 Live: Sony Xperia Z5 with fingerprint scanner, 23-megapixel camera launched: Specifications, features
thread.title_full: IFA 2015 Live: Sony Xperia Z5 with fingerprint scanner, 23-megapixel camera launched: Specifications, features - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: IFA 2015 Live: Sony Xperia Z5 with fingerprint scanner, 23-megapixel camera launched: Specifications, features
text: After months of leaks and rumors, Sony has finally launched the Xperia Z5 flagship at the IFA 2015 event in Berlin. The specifications are in line with the leaks that we have come across in the past couple of months. Similar to all previous Xperia ‘Z’ series flagships, the Xperia Z5 also carries the same design language with what Sony calls, the Omnibalance design. But there are small changes. For one the Xperia logo is embossed on the left side of the smartphone, while the main Sony logo is located at the back. The power button is still on the right hand side, but it is flatter and longer than before, and also has a fingerprint sensor integrated. The IP »
